cert.licence: This License Certificate is issued to
cert.permit: This Permit Certificate is issued to
cert.exploration: for the exploration of minerals on the land located at
cert.pipeline: for the pipeline on the land located at
cert.air: for the air permit on the land located at
cert.drilling: for the drilling permit on the land located at
cert.exploreEnt: The Licensee is entitled to explore for minerals
cert.pipelineEnt: The Licensee is entitled to pipeline
cert.airEnt: The Permit is entitled to fly
cert.drillingEnt: The Permit is entitled to drill
cert.land: on the Land in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Certificate
cert.issueAut: The Issuing Authority may revoke this Certificate if it fails to comply with any of the terms and conditions of this Certificate
